artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; corner of temple building at R edge, in falling rain; trees and foliage at L and bottom; dark sky; red seal in L margin
inscription: 近江八景の内　三井寺　大正六年七月 {Ōmi hakkei no uchi Mii-dera, Taishō rokunen shichigatsu} (The Eight Views of Lake Biwa, Mii Temple, July 1917)
markings: red collector seal: 杜品 {Tobin}; on back, red seal: 伊藤深水画　近江八景三井　摺刷二百枚限の内　第四十六番 {Itō Shinsui ga, Ōmi hakkei Mii shūsatsu nihyaku mai kagiri no uchi, dai yonjūroku ban} (picture by Itō Shinsui, Eight Views of Lake Biwa, Mii, printed edition of 200, number 46); red square publisher seals: 版元 {hanmoto} (publisher), ワタナベ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Eight Views of Lake Biwa (Ōmi hakkei no uchi 近江八景の内)
title: Mii Temple
